ygData.subject: Re: Dark Elf SK
ygData.msgSnippet: How do you recharge the boats? Later Chris Remlin Ryal, Warlord of House Ryal ... From: matthew tutor  To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
How do you recharge the boats?

Later
Chris
Remlin Ryal, Warlord of House Ryal

-----Original Message-----
From: matthew tutor <mtutor1@...>
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 5:48 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Dark Elf SK


They have the very bag you are wishing for it is called a travelers bag, and there is also the travelers boots, that cast sow on you temp, both are in najina but i am not to sure what lvl they are on at this time but i am after them now and i will report back to this board as soon as i know something more, but there is a web page that will help if you do not believe me.

http://www.gameznet.com/eq/equipment/travbackpack.html this is for the back pack

http://www.gameznet.com/eq/equipment/travpouch.html this is for the pouch

http://www.gameznet.com/eq/equipment/journeymanboots.html this is for the boots

good luck

Phrite De'vorn
----- Original Message -----
From: David
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, June 15, 1999 8:24 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Dark Elf SK


I was just making an observation with this statement. The only packs I know of that add about zero weight are a shaman summon spell, and that bag disappears as soon as you logout, as well as the items stored in the bag. Also these bags only have 4 slots, and have heard you can place 15 lbs. bricks of ore into them and it apples only a fraction of the weight to your encumbrance load (which is good for hunting ... rock dervs(?) in fire storm that give you these bricks). I WISH they would come out with a magic backpack that would do this, that wouldn't disappear at logout time. (how about that =)

Tenin - Tarew Marr
----- Original Message -----
From: Remlin
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 6:31 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Dark Elf SK


Where can u find these packs, cause this is my biggest problem as well!!
I need cash to get banded armor to compensate for my DE's low fighter charastics.

Thanks In Advance
Chris
Remlin Ryal, Warlord of House Ryal
Rallos Zek

And note I am not getting any experience from these trips (and if I could find a magic backpack that would carry 8 slots with no weight, or lower weight I would be trying to find them).
